A

addAllowableAction(Action) - Method in class game.ground.Gate
allows you to add a movement action
addBehavior(int, Behaviour) - Method in class game.actors.EnemyActor

allowableActions(Actor) - Method in class game.items.Rune
returns the list of allowable actions when the Runes are being held by the player
allowableActions(Actor, Location, String) - Method in class game.ground.Gate
checks to see if the actor has a key with the unlock ability if so it returns a UnlockGate action if the gate is Unlocked then it returns the MovePlayerAction.
allowableActions(Actor, String, GameMap) - Method in class game.actors.EnemyActor
checks for weapons in the other actors inventory and if there are any weapons it returns an attack action for those weapons

The priority of attack behaviour
